algorithm_technique: Hash map to group students by bench and count unique students per bench.
problem_summary_simple: Find the bench with the most unique students.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a hash map to associate bench IDs with sets of unique student IDs, then finds the maximum set size.
key_insights: A hash map (defaultdict) is ideal for grouping students by bench ID.
Using a set for each bench automatically handles duplicate student entries for the same bench.
The maximum value in the hash map's values (set sizes) gives the answer.
